snippets:
[
    // Subscript Superscript
    {trigger: "mm", replacement: "_{m}", options: "rmA"},   
    {trigger: "nn", replacement: "_{n}", options: "rmA"},  
    {trigger: "11", replacement: "_{1}", options: "rmA"},  
    {trigger: "00", replacement: "_{0}", options: "rmA"}, 
    {trigger: "ii", replacement: "_{i}", options: "rmA"},  
   
    {trigger: "([a-zA-Z])jj", replacement: "[[0]]_{j}", options: "rmA"},   
    {trigger: "([a-zA-Z])kk", replacement: "[[0]]_{k}", options: "rmA"}, 
    {trigger: "([a-zA-Z])ort", replacement: "[[0]]^{\\perp}", options: "rmA"}, 
    {trigger: "([a-zA-Z])PP", replacement: "[[0]]^{p}", options: "rmA"},
    {trigger: "([a-zA-Z])NN", replacement: "[[0]]^{n}", options: "rmA"},
    {trigger: "([a-zA-Z])II", replacement: "[[0]]^{i}", options: "rmA"},
    {trigger: "([a-zA-Z])OOO", replacement: "[[0]]^{\\infty}", options: "rmA"},

    // -----------------------------------------
    
    {trigger: "lanul", replacement: "^{\\circ}${0:X}", options: "rmA"},
    {trigger: "psyl", replacement: "^{\\circ}${0:X}", options: "rmA"},
    {trigger: "ranul", replacement: "${0:X}^{\\circ}", options: "rmA"},
    {trigger: "bol", replacement: "B(${0:X},${1:Y})", options: "rmA"},
    {trigger: "fx", replacement: "f(x) ${0: }", options: "rmA"},
    {trigger: "tbol", replacement: "T\\in B(${0:X},${1:Y})", options: "rmA"},
    {trigger: "tbol", replacement: "$T\\in B(${0:X},${1:Y})$ $2", options: "A"},
    
    // Math mode
    {trigger: "neq", replacement: "\\neq", options: "rmA"},
    {trigger: "norr", replacement: "\\trianglelefteq", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "tl", replacement: "T : ${0:X}\\rightarrow ${1:Y} ${2:a}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "fun", replacement: "${0:f} : ${1:X}\\rightarrow ${2:Y}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "[", replacement: "[$1]", options: "A"},
    {trigger: "^", replacement: "^{$1} $2", options: "A"},
    {trigger: "Raa", replacement: "\\Rightarrow ", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "raa", replacement: "\\rightarrow $1", options: "A"},
    {trigger: "xra", replacement: "\\xrightarrow{${0:n\\rightarrow\\mathbb{N}}} $1", options: "A"},
    {trigger: "Lra", replacement: "\\Longrightarrow ", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "lra", replacement: "\\longrightarrow${0: }", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "debil", replacement: "${1:x_n}\\rightharpoonup ${2:x}", options: "mA"},

    
	{trigger: "rd", replacement: "^{$0}$1", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "_", replacement: "_{$0}$1", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "$", replacement: "$$0$ $1", options: "A"},
    {trigger: "matt", replacement: "$$$0$$ ${1: }", options: "A"},
    {trigger: "(", replacement: "($0)$1", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "(", replacement: "($0) $1", options: "A"},
    {trigger: "chh", replacement: "\\chi_{[$0]}($1)", options: "A"},
    {trigger: "fa", replacement: "\\forall ${0:n}\\in ${1:\\mathbb{N}}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "ivv", replacement: "^{-1}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "qd", replacement: "\\quad", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "xev", replacement: "$X$ espacio vectorial ", options: "A"},
    {trigger: "evt", replacement: "espacio vectorial topologico", options: "A"},
    {trigger: "ban", replacement: "Banach $0", options: "A"},
    {trigger: "yev", replacement: "$Y$ espacio vectorial ", options: "A"},
    {trigger: "evn", replacement: "espacio vectorial normado ", options: "A"},

    {trigger: "...", replacement: "\\ldots", options: "A"},
    {trigger: "subb", replacement: "subespacio", options: "A"},
    {trigger: "norr", replacement: "\\lVert \\cdot \\rVert_{$0}$1", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "iff", replacement: "\\iff ", options: "A"},
    
    //Environments
    {trigger: "teoo", replacement: ">[!Theorem]", options: "A"},
    {trigger: "propp", replacement: ">[!Proposition]", options: "A"},
    {trigger: "lemm", replacement: ">[!Lemma]", options: "A"},
    {trigger: "prr", replacement: ">[!Proof]", options: "A"},
    {trigger: "corr", replacement: ">[!Corollary]", options: "A"},
    {trigger: "deff", replacement: ">[!Definition]", options: "A"},
    {trigger: "remm", replacement: ">[!Remark]", options: "A"},
    {trigger: "exx", replacement: ">[!Example]", options: "A"},
    
    {trigger: "XX", replacement: "$X$ $1", options: "A"},
    {trigger: "YY", replacement: "$Y$ $1", options: "A"},
    {trigger: "cont", replacement: "C[${0:a},${1:b}]", options: "mA"},
    
    
    //functional analysis
    {trigger: "ek", replacement: "e^{2\\pi imx}", options: "A"},
    {trigger: "pii", replacement: "\\pi ", options: "mA", priority: 1},
    // Greek letters
	{trigger: "@a", replacement: "\\alpha ${0:}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "@m", replacement: "\\mu ${0:}", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "@b", replacement: "\\beta $0", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "@g", replacement: "\\gamma", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "@G", replacement: "\\Gamma", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "@d", replacement: "\\delta ${0:}", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "@D", replacement: "\\Delta", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "@e", replacement: "\\epsilon", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: ":e", replacement: "\\varepsilon", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "@z", replacement: "\\zeta", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "@t", replacement: "\\theta", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "@T", replacement: "\\Theta", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: ":t", replacement: "\\vartheta", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "@i", replacement: "\\iota", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "@k", replacement: "\\kappa", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "@l", replacement: "\\lambda", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "@L", replacement: "\\Lambda", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "@s", replacement: "\\sigma", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "@S", replacement: "\\Sigma", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "@u", replacement: "\\upsilon", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "@U", replacement: "\\Upsilon", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "@o", replacement: "\\omega", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "@O", replacement: "\\Omega", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "ome", replacement: "\\omega", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "Ome", replacement: "\\Omega", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "lll", replacement: "\\ell^{${0:\\infty}}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "LLL", replacement: "L^{${0:p}}[${1:0},${2:1}]", options: "mA"},
    

    // Text environment
    {trigger: "tx", replacement: "\\text{$0}$1", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "pot", replacement: "^{2}$0", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "sq", replacement: "\\sqrt{ $0 }$1", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "//", replacement: "\\frac{$0}{$1}$2", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "ee", replacement: "e^{ $0 }$1", options: "mA"},
    
    // More operations
	{trigger: "([a-zA-Z])hat", replacement: "\\hat{[[0]]}", options: "rmA"},
    {trigger: "([a-zA-Z])bar", replacement: "\\bar{[[0]]}", options: "rmA"},
	{trigger: "([a-zA-Z])dot", replacement: "\\dot{[[0]]}", options: "rmA", priority: -1},
	{trigger: "([a-zA-Z])ddot", replacement: "\\ddot{[[0]]}", options: "rmA", priority: 1},
	{trigger: "([a-zA-Z])tilde", replacement: "\\tilde{[[0]]}", options: "rmA"},
	{trigger: "([a-zA-Z])und", replacement: "\\underline{[[0]]}", options: "rmA"},
    {trigger: "ov", replacement: "\\overline{$0} $1", options: "rmA"},
    
    
    {trigger: "inv", replacement: "^{-1} $0", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "hat", replacement: "\\hat{$0}$1", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "bar", replacement: "\\bar{$0}$1", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "dot", replacement: "\\dot{$0}$1", options: "mA", priority: -1},
	{trigger: "ddot", replacement: "\\ddot{$0}$1", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "cdot", replacement: "\\cdot", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "tilde", replacement: "\\tilde{$0}$1", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "und", replacement: "\\underline{$0}$1", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "vec", replacement: "\\vec{$0}$1", options: "mA"},

    // Proba
    {trigger: "ss", replacement: "\\sigma", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "22", replacement: "_{2}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "@@", replacement: "^{2}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "kk", replacement: "_{k}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "KK", replacement: "^{k}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "uu", replacement: "\\mu", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "sim", replacement: "\\sim ", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "ep", replacement: "ep", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "epp", replacement: "$(\\Omega,\\mathcal{A},\\mathcal{P})$ espacio probabilistico ", options: "A"},
    {trigger: "sva", replacement: "$\\{X_{n}\\}_{n\\in\\mathbb{N}}$ sucesion de variables aleatorias ", options: "A"},
    {trigger: "ctp", replacement: "X_{n}\\xrightarrow{pp} X", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "ctp", replacement: "$X_{n}\\xrightarrow{pp} X$", options: "A"},
    {trigger: "cp", replacement: "${0:X_{n}}\\xrightarrow{\\mathcal{P}}${1:X}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "cp", replacement: "$${0:X_{n}}\\xrightarrow{\\mathcal{P}}${1:X}$", options: "A"},
    {trigger: "cd", replacement: "${0:X_{n}}\\xrightarrow{\\mathcal{D}}${1:X}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "cd", replacement: "$${0:X_{n}}\\xrightarrow{\\mathcal{D}}${1:X}$", options: "A"},
    {trigger: "xnn", replacement:"$\\{X_{n}\\}$ sucesion de v.a", options: "A"},
    {trigger: "ndd", replacement: "\\mathcal{N}(0,${0:\\sigma^{2}})", options: "rmA"},  
   
    {trigger: "omx", replacement: "\\Omega_{X}", options: "rmA"}, 
    {trigger: "SS", replacement: "\\mathcal{S} ", options: "mA"},

    {trigger: "x...", replacement: "X_{1},\\ldots,X_{n} ", options: "mA"},

    // Caligraphy letters
    {trigger: "calf", replacement: "\\mathcal{F}", options: "rmA"}, 
    {trigger: "caln", replacement: "\\mathcal{N}", options: "rmA"},  
    {trigger: "calt", replacement: "\\mathcal{T}", options: "rmA"},
    {trigger: "calb", replacement: "\\mathcal{B}", options: "rmA"},
    {trigger: "calb", replacement: "\\mathcal{B}", options: "rmA"},
    {trigger: "calg", replacement: "\\mathcal{G}", options: "rmA"},

    
    

   

    // Symbols
    {trigger: "ooo", replacement: "\\infty", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "sum", replacement: "\\sum^{${1:\\infty}}_{${0:n=1}} $2", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "prod", replacement: "\\prod", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "lim", replacement: "\\lim\\limits_{ ${0:n} \\to ${1:\\infty} } $2", options: "mA"},

    {trigger: "<=", replacement: "\\leq ${0:.}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: ">=", replacement: "\\geq", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "->", replacement: "\\to", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "!>", replacement: "\\mapsto", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "=>", replacement: "\\implies", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "=<", replacement: "\\impliedby", options: "mA"},

	{trigger: "and", replacement: "\\cap", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "orr", replacement: "\\cup", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "inn", replacement: "\\in ${0:X}", options: "rmA"},
	{trigger: "notin", replacement: "\\not\\in", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "\\\\\\", replacement: "\\setminus", options: "mA"},
    
    {trigger: "sub", replacement: "\\subseteq ${0:X}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "sup=", replacement: "\\supseteq", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "supp", replacement: "\\supseteq ", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "eset", replacement: "\\emptyset", options: "rmA"},
	{trigger: "set", replacement: "\\{ $0 \\}$1", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "exx", replacement: "\\exists ${0:.}", options: "mA", priority: 1},
    
    // Capital letters
    {trigger: "HH", replacement: "\\mathcal{H}", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "HH", replacement: "$\\mathcal{H}$", options: "A"},
    {trigger: "PP", replacement: "\\mathcal{P}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "PP", replacement: "$\\mathcal{P}$", options: "A"},
    {trigger: "DD", replacement: "\\mathcal{D}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "DD", replacement: "$\\mathcal{D}$", options: "A"},
    {trigger: "SS", replacement: "\\mathcal{S}", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "SS", replacement: "$\\mathcal{S}$", options: "A"},
	{trigger: "CC", replacement: "\\mathbb{C}", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "RR", replacement: "\\mathbb{R}", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "ZZ", replacement: "\\mathbb{Z}", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "NN", replacement: "\\mathbb{N} ", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "QQ", replacement: "\\mathbb{Q} ", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "FF", replacement: "\\mathbb{F} $0", options: "rmA"},
    {trigger: "UU", replacement: "\\mathcal{U} $0", options: "rmA"},
    {trigger: "FF", replacement: "$\\mathbb{F}$ $0", options: "rA"},
	{trigger: "norm", replacement: "\\lvert $0 \\rvert $1", options: "mA", priority: 1},
	{trigger: "Norm", replacement: "\\lVert ${0:x} \\rVert $2", options: "mA", priority: 1},
]
matrixShortcutsEnvNames: pmatrix, cases, align, gather, bmatrix, Bmatrix, vmatrix, Vmatrix, array, matrix
autoEnlargeBracketsTriggers: sum, int, frac, prod, bigcup, bigcap
